item.title: Redrawing Vim Screen
item.description: Part of my current workflow for web development is writing code in NeoVim in a Terminal on one screen and checking results in the browser on another screen. The screens are virtual and I can change them using the Cmd + ← and Cmd + →. Reloading the browser tab I use Cmd + R. When switching screens and reloading is down quickly it happens that the Cmd + R hits the terminal which results in a nicely cleared terminal.
